name: No way to oasis
description:
This game was made under 74 hours for Mini Jam 53: Oasis

How to play:

this game only use mouse input. select the tower card from upper right screen, click the empty base (the round surface objects beside the road) to place the tower, kill all enemies!

this is my first game jam, so sorry maybe some bugs will still be found here. I will still upload a few updates after this.
beyond that, this is a fun experience when creating games with time and theme constraints. it looks like I'll be following some other game hours after this.
